description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You now have the ultimate defense on your Xbox! Pirates Attack features a cannon store to purchase powerful cannons to arm you on the forts throughout each of the Antilles. You will encounter battles with Lieutenants, light house, small town, port and forts. There is also a bonus level to help you build up your aim and defend and defeat the Pirate Attacks! Developed by Versplay Interactive.
